Key Match Events: Nicholas Pooran scored 67 off 40 balls to help West Indies win the second T20I match against India, taking a 2-0 lead in the series.
Akeal Hosein, Alzarri Joseph, and Romario Shepherd contributed to a strong bowling performance, restricting India to 152-7.
Post-Match Reflections: West Indies captain Hardik Pandya criticized the batting performance but acknowledged the bowlers' effort.
Player of the Match Nicholas Pooran expressed satisfaction with his performance and highlighted the team's ability to adapt during the match.
